abstract: Carnival reports shares rose 6 percent to close at $47.12 in quarter, and that it earned 20 cents a share, helped by higher spending onboard its cruises and lower fuel prices.
lead_paragraph: Higher onboard spending and strong bookings for Caribbean cruises, its biggest business, helped Carnival’s quarterly profit.

headline.main: Fuel Costs Help Cruise Company Profit Top Forecast
headline.print_headline: Fuel Costs Help Cruise Company Profit Top Forecast

snippet: Higher onboard spending and strong bookings for Caribbean cruises, its biggest business, helped Carnival’s quarterly profit.
